SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class SecurityGroupByAssetclassWithCashReport

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityPositionSummaryReport
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityGroupByBaseReport<AssetclassType>
grafioschtrader.reports.SecurityGroupByAssetclassWithCashReport
@Component public class SecurityGroupByAssetclassWithCashReport extends SecurityGroupByBaseReport<AssetclassType>
Comprehensive portfolio report that groups security positions by asset class type and includes cash account holdings as pseudo-securities for complete portfolio allocation analysis. Provides a unified view of both invested assets and liquid cash positions across all currencies, enabling accurate portfolio composition and allocation assessment.

This specialized report extends the base grouping functionality to address the critical requirement of including cash holdings in portfolio analysis.

Cash Account Handling:

The report implements sophisticated cash account integration:

  • Pseudo-Security Creation: Transforms cash accounts into security-like objects
  • Currency Classification: Separates main currency from foreign currency cash
  • Balance Calculation: Accurate cash balances based on transaction history
  • Asset Class Assignment: Appropriate categorization for reporting consistency
  • Negative ID Convention: Uses negative security IDs to distinguish cash from securities

Asset Class Categories:

Cash holdings are automatically classified into appropriate asset class types:

  • CURRENCY_CASH: Cash in the portfolio's main reporting currency
  • CURRENCY_FOREIGN: Cash in foreign currencies requiring conversion
  • Traditional Asset Classes: Securities grouped by their natural classifications

    • createGroupsAndCalcGrandTotal

      protected SecurityPositionDynamicGrandSummary<SecurityPositionDynamicGroupSummary<AssetclassType>> createGroupsAndCalcGrandTotal(Tenant tenant, List<SecurityPositionSummary> securityPositionSummaryList, DateTransactionCurrencypairMap dateCurrencyMap) throws Exception
      Description copied from class: SecurityPositionSummaryReport
      Template method for creating position groups and calculating grand totals. Subclasses must implement this method to define specific grouping strategies and calculation logic for their particular reporting requirements.

      This method enables different reporting formats and grouping strategies while leveraging the common position calculation infrastructure provided by the base class. Implementation should handle position aggregation, group creation, and grand total calculations according to the specific reporting needs.

      Overrides:
      createGroupsAndCalcGrandTotal in class SecurityGroupByBaseReport<AssetclassType>
      Parameters:
      tenant - the tenant context for which calculations are performed
      securityPositionSummaryList - list of individual security positions to group and summarize
      dateCurrencyMap - currency conversion context for multi-currency calculations
      Returns:
      comprehensive position summary with groups and grand totals
      Throws:
      Exception - if calculation or grouping operations fail
